text: The is an annual award presented by the Osaka prefectural government to groups or individuals that have made outstanding achievements in the arts and the improvement and promotion of Osaka's art cultureOsaka Culture Prize. Since 2009 the prize has been given to one individual or group a year. Prior to 2008, the prize was divided into five arts and culture subcategories. In 2008, no prize was givenOsaka Culture Prize Outline | Osaka Prefectural Government. ==Recipients== ===Osaka Culture Prize=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !!
